main.name: Aldo Abdillah Fathony
main.description: I am a Jr. Programmer, Jr. Web Developer
main.bio: I am a graduate of a Diploma in Construction Management with a strong foundation in Computer Network Engineering from my vocational high school education. This unique combination of technical and management expertise has shaped my problem-solving and analytical skills. Currently, I am focusing on becoming a specialist in UI/UX Design and Web Development, leveraging my diverse background to create user-centered digital solutions and build seamless, functional web experiences.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I am a graduate in Construction Management with a strong foundation in project planning, resource management, and construction processes.
I have a strong foundation in computer hardware, network security, and system administration, equipped with both theoretical knowledge and practical experience.

work.description: Inpecting a part appearance Doorsash for Hyundai Creta and Hyundai Stargazer cars.
